name: $Parameter Snippet MapList
description:
Insert Snippet for MapList.

Parameter Type: MapList

A list of StringMap items.

name: $Parameter Snippet StringMap
description:
Insert Snippet for StringMap.

Parameter Type: StringMap

A mapping of keys to values. A key can only be a string. For example, {"Env": "Prod"}.

name: $Parameter Snippet Boolean
description:
Insert Snippet for Boolean.

Parameter Type: Boolean

Accepts only true or false. Does not accept "true" or 0.

name: $Parameter Snippet Integer
description:
Insert Snippet for Integer.

Parameter Type: Integer

Integral numbers. Doesn't accept decimal numbers, for example 3.14159, or numbers wrapped in quotation marks, for example "3".

name: $Parameter Snippet StringList
description:
Insert Snippet for StringList.

Parameter Type: StringLIst

A list of String items separated by commas. For example ["cd ~", "pwd"]

name: $Parameter Snippet String
description:
Insert Snippet for String.

Parameter Type: String

A sequence of zero or more Unicode characters wrapped in quotation marks. For example, "i-1234567890abcdef0". Use backslashes to escape.
